column3: Latest;Siem Reap------: Provincial Immigration Departments took in two foreign females.------LIU FENG
column4: a 38-year-old Chinese national was detained in connection with a string of aggravated robberies (property-violence) on December 24. 2019 in  Sangkat Svay Dangkum
column6: 48 year old Filipino was arrested for fraud carried out on 18 October 2019 at a rented house in Siem Reap.------The two foreigners were ordered to be temporarily detained at the Siem Reap Provincial Police Headquarters for further questioning and setting up a case before the provincial court. ------POST NEWS
